channel.title: CVE Feed for INFINITUM FORM -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for INFINITUM FORM -- all

item.title: CVE-2024-30451|2024-03-29T16:42:13.228Z -- INFINITUM FORM -- Geo Controller
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in INFINITUM FORM Geo Controller allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Geo Controller: from n/a through 8.6.4.

item.title: CVE-2024-30227|2024-03-28T04:55:40.426Z -- INFINITUM FORM -- Geo Controller
item.description: Deserialization of Untrusted Data vulnerability in INFINITUM FORM Geo Controller.This issue affects Geo Controller: from n/a through 8.6.4.
